price: Dan barang siapa yang membawa kejahatan, maka disungkurkanlah muka mereka ke dalam neraka. Tiadalah kamu dibalasi, melainkan (setimpal) dengan apa yang dahulu kamu kerjakan.
arabic: وَمَن جَآءَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ فَكُبَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فِي ٱلنَّارِ هَلۡ تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman jāa bil-sayi-ati fakubbat wujūhuhum fī al-nāri hal tuj'zawna illā mā kuntum taʿmalūna
